title: Cardiff Cut
features: First published in 2001, this play features an audacious and anarchic monologue set on the streets of the city of Cardiff, written by a poet and performer who is daring in both material and language.
description: Lloyd Robson is a poet and prose writer, a workshop tutor, and a journalist. In 2002 he was appointed writer in residence at the University of Wales College's Newport School of Art, Media, and Design.
